generated_body: If you click on the article titled "Why the Amex Platinum card is best for active-duty military," you can expect to read about the specific benefits and features of the American Express Platinum card that cater to active-duty military personnel. Additionally, it may explore the eligibility criteria and any unique considerations for military members that differentiate this card from others in the market. Overall, the content will likely aim to inform readers about why this card stands out for active-duty individuals.
